thread.title: ATP World Tour 250, Budapest Men's Singles Results

title: ATP World Tour 250, Budapest Men's Singles Results

organizations.name: budapest men's singles results  results reuters

text: April 25, 2018 / 4:56 PM / Updated 18 hours ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour 250, Budapest Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Apr 26 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour 250, Budapest Men's Singles matches on Wednesday .. 1st Round .. Mikhail Youzhny (RUS) beat Zsombor Piros (HUN) 6-3 6-3 .. 2nd Round .. Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) beat 3-Richard Gasquet (FRA) 6-4 7-6 5-Aljaz Bedene (SLO) beat Matteo Berrettini (ITA) 7-6(2) 4-6 6-4 7-Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) beat Alexander Bublik (RUS) 6-1 6-4 Marco Cecchinato (ITA) beat 2-Damir Dzumhur (BIH) 6-3 6-1
